job_description.details:
Business Web Solutions (BWS) is seeking passionate and talented individuals to join our Web Development Internship program. This online/remote opportunity is ideal for candidates looking to kickstart their career in web development. we aim to train and nurture skilled interns who can seamlessly transition into full-time roles as needed.

Responsibilities:

Develop and design responsive websites using modern technologies.
Revamp existing websites to enhance user experience and functionality.
Plan website structures by creating detailed sitemaps and wireframes.
Work on front-end development to create engaging and interactive UI.
Improve user experience (UX) through intuitive designs and navigation.
Gain exposure to back-end technologies to ensure robust website performance.
Collaborate with team members on real-world projects and industry practices.


Eligibility Criteria:

Access to a PC or laptop with a reliable internet connection.
Proficiency in English for communication and documentation.
Open to fresh graduates and those passionate about web development.
Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is an advantage but not mandatory.


Perks and Benefits:

Internship Certificate upon successful completion.
Letter of Recommendation for exceptional performance.
Performance-based stipend.
Flexible work hours (2-3 hours daily, 5 days a week).
Practical training and mentorship from experienced professionals.
